extension.summary: Unofficial Spotify music plugin for Kodi
extension.description: Allows you to use your Spotify premium account to connect and play Spotify through Kodi.
extension.disclaimer: This product uses the SPOTIFY WEB API but is not endorsed, certified or otherwise approved in any way by Spotify. Spotify is the registered trademark of Spotify AB.
extension.news: v1.3.11 (2024-08-20) Fixed 'all albums' for artist menu. Added extra artist track options. Cleaned menus. 1.3.10: Replaced 'user/password' authentication with zeroconf authentication.
